remixlab.proscene
Class MathUtils

java.lang.Object
  remixlab.proscene.MathUtils

public class MathUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class that complements the PVector and PMatrix classes.

Constructor Detail

MathUtils

public MathUtils()
Method Detail

projectVectorOnAxis

public static PVector projectVectorOnAxis(PVector src,
                                          PVector direction)
Utility function that simply projects src on the axis of direction direction that passes through the origin.

direction does not need to be normalized (but must be non null).

projectVectorOnPlane

public static PVector projectVectorOnPlane(PVector src,
                                           PVector normal)
Utility function that simply projects src on the plane whose normal is normal that passes through the origin.

normal does not need to be normalized (but must be non null).

squaredNorm

public static float squaredNorm(PVector v)
Utility function that returns the squared norm of the PVector.

orthogonalVector

public static PVector orthogonalVector(PVector v)
Utility function that returns a PVector orthogonal to v. Its mag() depends on the PVector, but is zero only for a null PVector. Note that the function that associates an orthogonalVector() to a PVector is not continuous.

fromMatrix

public static final PMatrix3D fromMatrix(float[][] m)
Utility function that returns the PMatrix3D representation of the 4x4 m given in European format.
